name: Attuned_Might_of_the_Tanker_D
display_name: Attuned Might of the Tanker D
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Might of the Tanker D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Tankers and may be slotted into any Tanker damage power.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost, and Increases Attack Rate
